Note you may need 7-zip to extract this.  I downloaded it twice to find WinRar and Windows could not extract it as it sees it as 8000TB

On the + side Audio works for me on this one.  Other images Audio didn't work in my setup.  

On the - side itunes is expired and doesn't work.  Can't be uninstalled because it's part of OSX and can't be updated because it's verion 10.5
